io.github.bosifullstack.textAdventure.itemSystem

Class Weapon

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.bosifullstack.textAdventure.itemSystem.Item
      • io.github.bosifullstack.textAdventure.itemSystem.Weapon

  • public class Weapon
extends Item
    Weapon type of item, used by main character. Can be common or magical

              int damage)
        Creates magical weapon
        Parameters:
        name - String - Name of the weapon
        buyPrice - int - Price to buy the item
        sellPrice - int - Price to sell the item
        magic - Magic - Magic attached to the weapon
        damage - int - Damage of the weapon
